K10D0282_H0284:131b-1: sh'i ksha tra ya n'a ma s'u tra /
K10D0282_H0284:131b-3: bslab pa gsum gyi mdo zhes bya ba /
K10D0282_H0284:131b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0282_H0284:131b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-2: ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-3: grong spyil bu can du byon te /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-4: grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shing s'a la'i tshal na /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-5: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-8: 'di dag ni tshul khrims yin no //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-12: tshul khrims la goms par byas na /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-13: ting nge 'dzin la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-14: ting nge 'dzin la goms par byas na /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-16: shes rab la goms par byas na /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-20: gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-21: de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par
K10D0282_H0284:132a-22: grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi
K10D0282_H0284:132a-24: tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-26: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 'gyur ro //
K10D0282_H0284:132a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K10D0282_H0284:132a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
